name: HweeHwa Pang
content: HweeHwa PANG PANG, HweeHwa Professor and Dean School of Computing and Information Systems Singapore Management University 80 Stamford Road Singapore 178902 Email: hhpang AT smu.edu.sg Tel: +65 6828-0265 Fax: +65 6828-0919 URL: http://www.mysmu.edu/faculty/hhpang/ HweeHwa Pang received the BSc  with first class honors  and MS degrees from the National University of Singapore in 1989 and 1991, respectively, and the PhD degree from the University of Wisconsin at Madison in 1994, all in Computer Science. His research interests include database management systems, data security, information quality, operating systems, and multimedia servers. He has many years of hands-on experience in system implementation and project management. He has also participated in transferring some of his research results to industry. <Home>    <Research> <Teaching> <Professional Activities>
